page.title: 14The 100 Club
page.content: The 100 Club is situated on the Countess Wear estate. It is run by Devon County as a Youth and Community centre. It is staffed by one fulltime and eight part time workers. It offers something for all ages from toddlers to senior citizens. There is a large hall. Roller skates can be hired and roller hockey can be played there or people can bring bikes and do tricks on them. On every evening there is something happening, for instance:- Monday - Disco and games 11-14 years Tuesday - Club 7-10 years Wednesday - BMX and Skateboard Club Thursday - Countess Wear Dynamoes Training. Friday - Disco and Club 12- 18 years. Saturday - Bingo for pensioners. During the summer holidays the club is open and offers a wide range of activities. It is very popular.
